sourcesContent:
import React, { useState ,useEffect} from 'react' import '../EachDeals/EachDeals.css' import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker'; import 'react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios' function EachDeals() { const { dealId } = useParams(); const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState(null); const [dealDetails,setDealDetails]= useState({}) const handleDateChange = (date) => { setSelectedDate(date); }; useEffect(async()=>{ try{ const response =await axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/topDeals/${dealId}`) console.log(response.data) setDealDetails(response.data) let url= require(`../../uploads/deals/${dealId}.jpg`) }catch(err){ console.log(err) } },[]) return ( <>

Top Deals

Origin : {dealDetails?.from}
Destination : {dealDetails?.to}
Airline : {dealDetails?.airline}
Baggage :{dealDetails?.Baggage}
Price :{dealDetails?.price}

{dealDetails?.description}

Book Now

Select a peroid That You are Available


Continue as Guest User

or
) } export default EachDeals
